title: James Earl Jones' Big Break, New Music From Bette Midler, Robotic Baby Penguin
teaser: Did you know James Earl Jones had trouble speaking as a kid? Bette Midler talks about her new album It's the Girls!. Plus, a robotic baby penguin that spies for scientists and filmmakers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
